description: Add AuthModule import to main application module. Include 'import { AuthModule } from './modules/auth/auth.module';' and add AuthModule to the imports array. This registers the /auth/login endpoint in the backend.
title: Import AuthModule in app.module.ts

descriptionHistory.description: Add AuthModule import to main application module. Include 'import { AuthModule } from './modules/auth/auth.module';' and add AuthModule to the imports array. This registers the /auth/login endpoint in the backend.
